I tried to register again: febohik454@armcams.com, I don't see a problem.
Попробовал ещё раз зарегистрироваться: febohik454@armcams.com, проблемы не вижу.

As for the authorization error, we have not received such a message before, but the error comes from bidspirit.Let's check what is wrong with the registration, earlier we tried to register and there were no problems, email: jenodin274@trufilth.com. You can delete this account in the bidspirit portal cabinet. I tried to register again: febohik454@armcams.com, no error occurred.

Что касается ошибки авторизации, ранее мы не получали подобного сообщения, но ошибка идёт со стороны bidspirit, Проверим что не так с регистрацией, ранее мы пробовали зарегистрироваться и проблем не возникло, email: jenodin274@trufilth.com. В кабинете портала bidspirit можете удалить этот аккаунт. Попробовал ещё раз зарегистрироваться: febohik454@armcams.com, ошибки не возникло.

Hello! You changed the "Archive" page when asked to rename. If you want to change the page, then you need to specify it in the plugin settings. See Appendix 1. As for the authorization error, we have not received such a message before, but the error comes from bidspirit.Let's check what is wrong with the registration, earlier we tried to register and we got it, email: jenodin274@trufilth.com. You can delete this account in the bidspirit portal cabinet. I tried to register again: febohik454@armcams.com, no error occurred.

Что касается ошибки авторизации, ранее мы не получали подобного сообщения, но ошибка идёт со стороны bidspirit, Проверим что не так с регистрацией, ранее мы пробовали зарегистрироваться и у нас получилось, email: jenodin274@trufilth.com. В кабинете портала bidspirit можете удалить этот аккаунт. Попробовал ещё раз зарегистрироваться: febohik454@armcams.com, ошибки не возникло.

Hello! You changed the "Archive" page when asked to rename. If you want to change the page, then you need to specify it in the plugin settings. See Appendix 1. As for the authorization error, we have not received such a message before, but the error comes from bidspirit. Let's check what is wrong with the registration, earlier we tried to register and we got it, email: jenodin274@trufilth.com. You can delete this account in the bidspirit portal cabinet. I also tried to register again: febohik454@armcams.com, no error occurred.

Hello! Вы изменили страницу "Archive", когда спрашивали о том чтобы переименовать. Если захотите сменить страницу, тогда вам надо указать её в настройках плагина. Смотрите приложение 1. Что касается ошибки авторизации, ранее мы не получали подобного сообщения, но ошибка идёт со стороны bidspirit, Проверим что не так с регистрацией, ранее мы пробовали зарегистрироваться и у нас получилось, email: jenodin274@trufilth.com. В кабинете портала bidspirit можете удалить этот аккаунт. Так же попробовал ещё раз зарегистрироваться: febohik454@armcams.com, ошибки не возникло.
Здравствуйте! Я добавил параметр overrideOthers=true к запросу users/login.api и в случае если человек был авторизован ранее в портале - проблема решена.

Hello! I added the overrideOthers = true parameter to the users / login.api request, and if the person was previously authorized in the portal, then there are no problems. The problem remains if you try to log in to different browsers on the same site under the same account.

Здравствуйте! Я добавил параметр overrideOthers=true к запросу users/login.api и в случае если человек был авторизован ранее в портале, то проблем нет. Проблема остаётся если пытаться авторизоваться в разных браузерах на одном сайте под одним и тем же аккаунтом.
from Portal
Доступы к админке сайта:
To move a domain to a new site, we need access to the place of domain registration to change NS records to a new server. Or you can do it yourself By specifying for your domain:
Hello! Your site is ready. Please check it. Now it is available at the link: http://soaresmendonca.ln12.tempurl.info/ If all is well, it remains to move the domain to a new server.
Здравствуйте! Ваш сайт готов. Просим проверить его. Сейчас он доступен по ссылке: http://soaresmendonca.ln12.tempurl.info/ Если всё хорошо, остаётся совершить переезд домена на новый сервер.
Для перезда домена на новый сайт нам нужен доступ к месту регистрации домена для смены NS записей на новый сервер. Или же вы можете сделать это сами Указав для своего домена:
Send email to client from support email and ask for site approve on temp link http://$new_user.ln12.tempurl.info Ask for dns admin link user and pass if client didn't sent in client form
On offer publish screen Member will be able to click on statistics and see requests statistics graph for selected area based on room he selected
Approved member will be able to publish the offer based on max number of offers he can publish setted by Admin

After the Member finishes adding the rooms he will see a page explaining to him what his profile is waiting for approval by Admin. After Admin will approve the Member - Member will get email with note what he can continue and publish the offers.
And will be able to continue and create room/s.
After registration, Members will see a page with an explanation of the process.
Member will fill up the registration form
A notification about the registration of a new Member will be sent to Admin and Admin will be able to approve the Member.
As a Client web - I will be able to fill up a form with my name, email, mobile phone, my preferences (maximum price, area, weekdays, what in room), so I will get offers macheing these preferences.

On the page with the "Leave a request" form, fill in the fields with contact information, the maximum price for the offer and selecting the necessary parameters from the list of attributes for the room, as well as specifying the required date, save the offer.
By clicking on the link with the phone number in the message, the Member should answer me and book an offer for the specified time.
After the end of call with Client, Members will receive a sms with a link to the offer edit and will be able to close the offer so the system will not send the offer to additional clients.

As an Admin - I will be able to view a list of offers, so I will be able to see if some Members are abusing the system. As an Admin - I will be able to view a list of calls for each offer and listen to call recording, so I will be able to understand how the sales process was done.

As an Admin - I will be able to approve member registration applications, so I will select which members can publish offes. As an Admin - I will be able to see price statistics for all offers, so I will understand the trends in the app. As an Admin - I will be able to view/edit/delete Members, so I will be able to manage the app. As an Admin - I will be able to set maximum number of offes what Members can make per week, so I will be able to reduce Members abuse.
Clients will get the offer by push notification, sms or email and will be able to mark the offer as not relevant to call the Member. All calls will be recorded using call redirect service.
When an offer appears in the system corresponding to the specified parameters in the application, a message with a number to contact the Member is sent to the phone.
